blogs.paragraph:
Want even more chances to win? In addition to our solutions draw, we are also holding a second prize draw for code reviews.

To enter, select another personâ€™s entry from the JavaScriptmas forum, record a quick scrim explaining your feedback on the code, and post it in response on Discord.
